citeinfo.origin: Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Ocean Science And Productivity, Pacific
citeinfo.title: Endeavor Ridge Hot Vents Oceanic Processes, 1984-present

descript.abstract: Part of an international program to study oceanic ridges, including sediment traps, current meters, and water properties.
descript.purpose: Studying oceanic processes in the vicinity of hot vents.
descript.supplinf: Risk Justification: Some data not in regional data centre Risk of Loss: Medium Impact Justification: Long term time series (more than 10 years) Impact of Loss: High Recommended Action: Bring rest of data to archives

cntaddr.address: Institute of Ocean Sciences, P.O. Box 6000, 9860 West Saanich Road

dataqual.logic: CTD data processed using normal IOS processing procedures. Normal standardization of CTD instruments at IOS.
dataqual.complete: Dataset Complications: The accuracy of the CTD data may vary depending on the instruments used and whether collaborating data were collected for intercomparison purposes. Guildline CTDs are standardized at IOS; Sea-Bird CTD`s are calibrated at Sea-Bird Electronics in Bellevue, Washington. Electronic Data Complications: Null
